subtests.name: Can set 'flex-shrink' to CSS-wide keywords: initial
Can set 'flex-shrink' to CSS-wide keywords: inherit
Can set 'flex-shrink' to CSS-wide keywords: unset
Can set 'flex-shrink' to CSS-wide keywords: revert
Can set 'flex-shrink' to var() references:  var(--A)
Can set 'flex-shrink' to a number: calc(2 + 3)
Setting 'flex-shrink' to a length throws TypeError
Setting 'flex-shrink' to a percent throws TypeError
Setting 'flex-shrink' to a time throws TypeError
Setting 'flex-shrink' to an angle throws TypeError
Setting 'flex-shrink' to a flexible length throws TypeError
Setting 'flex-shrink' to a URL throws TypeError
Setting 'flex-shrink' to a transform throws TypeError
